summary: Teens in a Turkish prison struggle to survive under hideous conditions. Made by dying Yilmaz Guney in France, after he escaped from a Turkish prison, enabling him to accept his award at ... See full summary »
cast: Tuncel Kurtiz|Ayse Emel Mesci Kuray|Malik Berrichi|Nicolas Hossein|Isabelle Tissandier|Zirek|Ali Berktay|Selahattin Kuzmoglu|Jean-Pierre Colin|Jacques Dimanche|Ali Dede Altuntas|Necdet Nakiboglu|Sema Kuray|Zeynep Kuray|Habes Bounabi|Bernard Certeau|Jérémie Nassif|Christina Castillo|Aïcha Arouali|Betty Nocella|Joëlle Guigui|Sylvie Flepp|Schahla Aalam|Meral Çetinkaya|Saban|Sisko|Ziya
title: El muro (Duvar)
